description:
If you’ve ever worked in retail, you’ve dealt with nasty customers. But what if the good customers are worse than the bad ones?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Isetsu Gaikotsu Shoten`in Honda-san / Shigoto Nanka Itsudemo Yamerareru no Da
The Alternate Skull-face Bookseller Honda-san / You Can Quit Your Job Whenever You Want
異説骸骨書店員 本田さん / 仕事なんかいつでも辞められるのだ
